title: Spells

# Spells

This section complements Spellcasting with an index overview. For a searchable, filterable list with full details, open the Spells browser.

- Levels: 0 (cantrips) to 9th level.
- Schools: Abjuration, Conjuration, Divination, Enchantment, Evocation, Illusion, Necromancy, Transmutation.
- Components: V (verbal), S (somatic), M (material).
- Tags: ritual, concentration.
- Mechanics often reference saving throws and areas of effect.

## Browse Spells

Use the dedicated viewer to search, filter by level/school, and open details:

[Open Spells Browser](/spells)

Tip: The viewer adapts to your selected language.
